summary: All four requirements (REQ-1 through REQ-4) are fully implemented. The diff shows three prominent blue rectangular buttons at the bottom of the screen with solid blue backgrounds (#2563eb, #3b82f6, #1d4ed8), each containing an icon and text label. Button 1 has a Mic icon with 'Enregistrer mes notes', Button 2 has a FileText icon with 'Voir mes notes', and Button 3 has a Trash2 icon with 'Effacer mes notes'. Text color is dark gray (#1f2937) on the blue backgrounds. No missing requirements or hallucinated features detected.
